Posit Data Science Hangout - Live Every Thursday at 12 PM ET.

Each week, host Rachael Dempsey invites an accomplished data science leader to talk about their experience and answer questions from the audience. The discussion focuses mainly on the human elements of data science leadership. There‚Äôs no sales or marketing fluff, just great insights from inspiring professionals.

üìπ Past hangouts are also available to watch.

Channels the nextflow podcast - Pre-recorded every fortnight.

Talking about news in the Nextflow ecosytem and speaking with pioneers in the field.

Posit::conf(2023) - September 17-20, 2023.

Two days of workshops, two days of conference keynotes and talks, and endless opportunities to connect our data science community. Experience it in person or virtually.

dockercon 2023 - October 4-5, 2023.

DockerCon returns in-person in Los Angeles and online from anywhere in the world this October. Meet and learn from thousands of developers and industry leaders to power up your technical knowledge.

A showcase of the latest developments and innovations from the Nextflow world held in Barcelona and streamed online. Also includes a virtual nf-core Hackathon.

New York R Conference - July 11-12, 2023.

The R Conference hosts one of the most elite gatherings of data scientists and data professionals who come together to explore, share, and inspire ideas, and to promote the growth of open source ideals.
